title: Display entry point in AI Trade Analysis card

requirements.summary: Display entry point prominently at the top of the AI Trade Analysis card with price formatting, color coding based on trade direction, label, reasoning text, and clear visual hierarchy above take-profit targets
acceptanceCriteria: Entry point price is displayed at the top of the AI Trade Analysis card
Entry point section appears above take-profit targets section
Entry point has clear label 'Entry Point' or similar
Entry point price is color-coded green for buy, red for sell/short
Entry reasoning text is displayed if available in the recommendation object
Visual hierarchy makes entry point immediately visible (appropriate font size, spacing, icons)
Entry point formatting matches the existing price display patterns in the card

file_operations.description: Add a new entry point section at the top of the card component, positioned above the existing take-profit targets section. Display the entry point price from the recommendation object with appropriate currency formatting. Apply color coding: green (text-green-600 dark:text-green-400) for 'buy' direction, red (text-red-600 dark:text-red-400) for 'sell' or 'short' direction. Include a clear 'Entry Point' label using appropriate typography (font-semibold). If recommendation.entryReasoning exists, display it below the price. Use consistent spacing, icons (TrendingUp for buy, TrendingDown for sell), and font sizes to establish clear visual hierarchy that matches existing card patterns for take-profit and stop-loss displays. Ensure the entry point section is immediately visible and distinct from other card sections.
